Html:
Hi,

I was wondering if it is possible to add a new line in the header, and if so, how I would do it?

Essentially, I want my header to be like this:

Report Title
Report information list: a, b, c, d
Report additional info: x, y, z, 1, 2, 3

I want it left aligned and that is achieved fine using &L. I can make them concatenate onto the same line then bleed over onto the second, but that's not how I want it. The above is achieved through new lines, but I don't know how to force on in the header?

Regards,
N9ne
It should be possible to use PHP's newline character: \n or \n\r

It should be possible to use PHP's newline character: or
